coredata.dc:title: Issues and challanges in business rule-based information systems development
coredata.prism:publicationName: Proceedings of the 13th European Conference on Information Systems, Information Systems in a Rapidly Changing Economy, ECIS 2005

abstract.ce:para: An explicit manipulation of business rules in information systems development (ISD) is an old domain. There were many attempts in the last two decades to define how the rules should be dealt with throughout the ISD activities. Despite many results that have been achieved, several questions regarding business rule manipulation within ISD remain unresolved and present challenges for future research. The objective of this paper is to discuss these challenges and where possible to point out some directions for potential solutions.
